fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Peer into three players tonight and learn their visitors as a collective. You won't be able to see who visits a specific target, only that they visited one of three. Your targets Defense will be set to Vulnerable on the night following

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must target three players each night.
- You cannot self-target.
- If one of your targets dies on the night you're watching them, your vision will be blocked and your ability will fail on that target.
- Your visits are Astral.
